links.title: Apple Card Users Will Now Receive 3% Daily Cash on Purchases at Ace Hardware
links.description: Apple Card users will now receive 3% Daily Cash on purchases made at Ace Hardware stores in the U.S., in the Ace Hardware app, and on AceHardware.com. To be eligible for 3% Daily Cash, the purchase must be completed via Apple Pay using the digital version of the Apple Card in the Wallet app on the iPhone or Apple Watch.

links.title: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL), Amazon.com, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMZN) - Breaking Down AT&T's Stock After WarnerMedia Spin-Off
links.description: Nearly four years after fighting a hard battle to acquire WarnerMedia and accelerating its foray into the media business, AT&T (NYSE: T) has gone back to its roots to focus on being a telecommunications company.

$AAPL  
4/19/2022 
 
We don't have earnings on AAPL until next week 4/28/2022. Watching this ascending triangle on AAPL (4hr) chart. If we reject, we'll head down for 163 (lower lows), but if we break through we should head for 170-171 level. Lets see how AAPL reacts to the other techs earnings + the overall market direction over the course of the next two weeks!  
 
Red zone = 166.50-167.50 (supply zone) 
 
Above 167.50 room to run to grey zone -> 
Grey zone = 170-171 
 
FOLLOW 
& LETS MAKE MONEY💰
